attributes.action: To get recognition from DWP that there is NO CURE  FOR  AUTISM
attributes.additional_details: As a mother of 2 Autistic children I have joined many groups online. There are stories of family's being told they can no longer have DLA/ PIP with a diagnosis of Autism. DWP are employing staff that have no understanding of what Autism is and how it effects children/adults. We need change to make DWP aware that you cannot grow out of autism, cannot have medication to make it vanish. We need recognition that DWP, ATOS, CAPITA and MAXIMUS train staff  to understand and stop Austerity with AUTISM
attributes.background: Since the Conservative party have been in power and the treasury have stated that major changes will happen for AUSTERITY. My self and many families looking after autistic children and adults have been made to feel that AUTISM does not exist.  Due to DWP not wanting to support us with benefits.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

For example, you could start a petition calling for the staff of the DWP, and its contractors, to have mandatory training in understanding autism. Alternatively, you may wish to start a petition calling for all people with a diagnosis of autism to be entitled to receive DLA/PIP.
